definitions.definition: A river in Blaenau Gwent borough county borough, Caerphilly borough county borough, and the City of Newport , Wales , which runs into the Severn Estuary at the same place as the River Usk .

main_definition: A river in Blaenau Gwent borough county borough, Caerphilly borough county borough, and the City of Newport , Wales , which runs into the Severn Estuary at the same place as the River Usk .
